Healthy individual 25 45 year age may eligible study . Overweight subject must BMI 25 40 , non-overweight control subject BMI 19 24.9 . Candidates screen medical history , physical examination , blood test electrocardiogram ( EKG ) . They instruct record dietary intake 3-day period collect urine 24-hour interval . Participants food record review week screen visit . They schedule overnight admission Clinical Center . Non-overweight subject one two inpatient stay ; overweight subject six inpatient stay plus frequent nutrition counseling session . The subject lie table 15 60 minute body composition measure low-dose x-ray . - Single-slice CT scan compare amount fat tissue skin abdomen . Subjects wear close-fitting clothing enter small capsule call Bod-Pod . They breathe normally capsule body fat composition study . - Blood test . Blood sample draw analyze thyroid hormone , lipid , glucose , electrolytes , clot factor , kidney function , red cell DNA . - Euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp measure effect insulin body derive index insulin-sensitivity . Catheters place vein arm vein hand side body . Insulin glucose infused catheter arm , blood sample draw catheter hand every 5 minute measure glucose level . In addition individual nutritional counseling , group session provide every 2 week first 3 month study every month .
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity global public health problem epidemic proportion . It source considerable morbidity early mortality U.S. associate increase risk diabetes , hypertension , cardiovascular disease , cancer . In recent year , new evolve concept emerge regard obesity chronic endocrine disorder inflammation . Moreover , grow body evidence indicate obesity alters profile constellation gene change biomarkers inflammation gene expression reverse weight loss . In addition , study local adipose tissue microenvironment mean microdialysis . The study design incorporate two basic objective : 1 . Comparison Non-Overweight Controls v . Overweight Subjects Baseline 2 . Correlation change Overweight patient time lose weight calorie-restricted diet . To end , 30 Non-Overweight Controls ( BMI 19.0 24.9 ) 80 Overweight Subjects ( BMI 25.0 45.0 ) enrol . Baseline study , obtain participant include : blood test , anthropometric index , body composition air-displacement plethysmography , indirect calorimetry , intravenous glucose tolerance test index insulin sensitivity , subcutaneous adipose tissue microdialysis , subcutaneous adipose tissue biopsy . These procedure require overnight hospital admission Clinical Center . Overweight Subjects prescribe calorie-restricted diet follow one year . They undergo repeat study regular , 3-month interval assess serial change various parameter provide correlative data degree rate weight loss achieve . DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Age 2545 year , male female BMI 25.045.0 kg/m ( 2 ) Overweight Subjects 19.024.9 kg/m ( 2 ) NonOverweight Controls Healthy , determine medical history laboratory test Written inform consent EXCLUSION CRITERIA : BMI le 19.0 great 45.0 kg/m ( 2 ) History symptom compatible cardiovascular disease , include arrhythmias syncopal episode , use prescription medication heart condition , stroke , peripheral vascular disease Allergy lidocaine Pregnancy breastfeeding Menopause perimenopausal period ( FSH great 15 mIU/ml ) Use hormonal contraceptive estrogen replacement therapy Alcohol ( 2 drink per day CAGE great 2 question and/or current/regular use drug amphetamine , cocaine , heroin , marijuana Current use tobacco product ( smoke chew ) History Diabetes Mellitus , either type 1 2 , Fasting Glucose great 126 mg/dl Use cholesterol lipidlowering drug , fast serum lipid range require medication per Adult Treatment Panel III recommendation National Cholesterol Education Program Liver disease ALT serum level great twofold laboratory reference standard Renal insufficiency estimate creatinine clearance less equal 50 ml/min Current use medication , dietary supplement ( include fish oil ) , alternative therapy know alter thyroid function exception occasional use NSAIDs ( 3 tablets/week maximum ) Benzodiazepines ; use NSAIDs 10 day precede hospital admission Current history , symptom , behavior compatible psychiatric disorder therapy psychotropic medication would incompatible safe successful participation study History drug alcohol abuse within last 5 year ; current use drug alcohol Keloid formation ( relative subcutaneous adipose tissue biopsy ) Hypo hyperthyroidism ( TSH great equal 10 ; less equal 0.1 mIU/L ) Blood pressure great 160/95 mm Hg use prescription medication treatment hypertension Cushing Syndrome
